DataElement.preferredName: Weight Change Past 6 Months Occurrence Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not a change in weight in the past 6 months occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An increase or decrease in the weight of an individual._A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
